name: Mic Clicker
description:
Mic Clicker is a game about clicking a microphone and each time you do, you gain 1 dB in audio points, you will get notes every time you hit a milestone of how loud it would sound depending on the amount of dB points you have got. This game also has Xbox One Controller support, so if you wanna rest in your bed while you click, you can do that (Playing with the controller is more fun in my mind).

This is just a small little game to keep you people (the players) entertained until the release of my next BIG game called King Nightmares, witch will be coming to pc for FREE only found here on itch.io!
